note: Historian at Georgetown - Democracy and Its Discontents - Podcast: Is This Democracy https://anchor.fm/is-this-democracy - Newsletter: Democracy Americana https://thomaszimmer.substack.com/

Political scientist--Comparative Politics (Europe & East Asia). Spent half the 2010s in Turin, Italy. My research covers welfare states, varieties of capitalism, demographic aging and gender issues. A bi-cultural product of Japan & Galicia (Spain). The photo is my beloved Wheaten Terrier. Just migrated from Twitter. I mostly post in English & Japanese (and follow Spanish- and Italian-language accounts too).

The UN report, entitled "Anatomy of a Genocide", says Israel has violated three of the five acts listed in the UN Genocide Convention.

Israel is on the UN's “black list” of countries and organizations that harm children. On the so-called “list of shame”, Israel is listed alongside “terrorist groups” such as Daesh/ISIS, al-Qaida and Boko Haram.

The UN’s international court of justice (ICJ) has ordered Israel to end its occupation of the Palestinian territories “as rapidly as possible”.

Writer, psychologist & educator here to learn & share info on politics, psych, education, history &, especially, structural power. Antifascist, anti-oligarchy, atheist. I boost what I find interesting, regardless of whether I agree with it. Resisting fascism includes countering disinformation with facts. I prefer evidence, not evidence-free opinion.
